Description.Text: Reikartz Sevastopol is a modern 3-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in west Sevastopol. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, free parking, onsite dining and a 24-hour bar. Kamyshova bay is a pleasant and peaceful district of the city boasting great coastal views. Nearby places of interest include a sandy beach and Peremohy Park. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Sevastopol destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building with a light-coloured facade and balconies. Facilities include a spacious terrace with tables and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 35sqm and decorated in a simple style with neutral tones, light wood furniture and carpeted floors. Some rooms feature a private balcony. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar and safe. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The hotel restaurant offers Ukrainian and European dishes in a bright modern dining room. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks in a comfortable setting at the 24-hour hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
